name: Adam Smith
learned: Adam Smith is a master of deception, skilled in the art of manipulation. He knows how to exploit people's vulnerabilities to his advantage.
currently: Adam Smith is writing a book about the importance of creativity and how it can shape the world. Adam is also curious about who will be running for the local mayor election next month.
lifestyle: Adam Smith goes to bed late at night, often past midnight, wakes up around 7am, and eats dinner around 8pm. He tends to keep to himself and avoids social gatherings.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 8:00 am
Write in personal journal and reflect on the day until bedtime, which is past midnight
